snippet.title: Amber Heard's coming out struggle | Daily Celebrity News | Splash TV
snippet.description:
The 32-year-old actress identifies as bisexual and has said that telling her parents she was in a relationship with a woman for the first time wasn't easy, because of their "religious" background.

SUBSCRIBE NOW : https://goo.gl/JaLP0U

Amber Heard's parents "didn't know how to process" things when she told them she was bisexual.

The 32-year-old actress identifies as bisexual and has said that telling her parents she was in a relationship with a woman for the first time wasn't easy, because of their "religious" background.

She said: "I am from Austin, Texas. My dad is out of central casting Texan. Good Southern man, and I was raised in a religious home. And being an outspoken lesbian, atheist, vegetarian, I remember when I told them about my relationship, that I was in love with this woman, and at the beginning of that it was just tears, tears.”

But the 'Aquaman' star says that while her parents didn't understand her sexuality at first, their "attitudes and hearts" changed over time.

Speaking during a panel at SXSW, she added that five years later, she was getting an award and had asked her parents to drive out to Dallas.

Upon collecting her award, she said she could “see them sitting front and center and here I am getting this 'gay' award... My parents in five years, look at the journey. Attitudes and hearts can change."
